oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Well-posedness and scattering for the mass-energy NLS on $\mathbf{R}^n\times \mathcal M^k$
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Tarulli, Mirko
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Analysis of PDEs
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the nonlinear Schr\"odinger equation posed on product spaces $\mathbf R^n\times \mathcal M^k$, for $n\geq 1$ and $k\geq1$, with $\mathcal M^k$ any $k$-dimensional compact Riemaniann manifold. The main results concern global well-posedness and scattering for small data solutions in non-isotropic Sobolev fractional spaces. In the particular case of $k=2$, $H^1$-scattering is also obtained.
